def.dt: :marked by wide separation of component particles :thin rare air
:marked by unusual quality, merit, or appeal :distinctive

entry.et: alteration of earlier rere, from Middle English, from Old English hrēre boiled lightly; akin to Old English hrēran to stir, Old High German hruoren

def.dt: :cooked so that the inside is still red rare roast beef
:any of a group of similar oxides of metals or a mixture of such oxides occurring together in widely distributed but relatively scarce minerals

:any of a series of metallic elements of which the oxides are classed as rare earths and which include the elements of the lanthanide series and sometimes yttrium and scandium called also rare earth metal
